price: (Àwọn ni) àwọn tí iṣẹ́ wọn ti bàjẹ́ nínú ìṣẹ̀mí ayé, (àmọ́ tí) wọ́n ń lérò pé dájúdájú àwọn ń ṣe iṣẹ́ rere.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ضَلَّ سَعۡيُهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَهُمۡ يَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّهُمۡ يُحۡسِنُونَ صُنۡعًا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna ḍalla saʿyuhum fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wahum yaḥsabūna annahum yuḥ'sinūna ṣun'ʿan
